mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS(MID, PWD, NAME, BIRTHDAY, PROFILEPIC, REGDATE, FAMCODE) VALUES(#{mid}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{profilepic}, GETDATE(), #{mid});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM MEMBERS WHERE MID <> #{param1}) MEMBERS WHERE FAMCODE = #{param2} ORDER BY BIRTHDAY ASC;
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET NAME = #{name} WHERE MID = #{mid}
